node.display_long_description:
Inspired by revered action movies like John Wick and Equilibrium, Pistol Whip stylishly dovetails the pulse-pounding energy of a rhythm game with explosive First-person shooter gameplay. Journey through a cinematic bullet hell powered by a breakneck soundtrack to become the ultimate action hero.

Includes Pistol Whip's first cinematic campaign - 2089. This gritty 5 scene expansion introduces deadly new weapons to help you survive an off-world plague of killer machines and unravel the mystery behind their violent uprising. Featuring music by Magic Sword and artwork by fan-favorite comic book artist Fico Ossio.

• Infiltrate a fever dream of hand-crafted scenes, from bank heists to android uprisings, each uniquely designed to music.
• Take it over-the-top with a variety of gameplay mods, such as Dual Wield, to enable the ultimate gun kata experience.
•Featuring a variety of artists from Kannibalen Records, including Magic Sword, HVDES, Black Tiger Sex Machine, and more...

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
Hotfix version 0.6.26.94 Changelog
*Gun pitch customization should now affect both hands appropriately

nodes.title: First-ever Cinematic Campaign, '2089,' Available Now!
nodes.body_text:
Our first-ever cinematic campaign featuring five linked scenes is out now!

About 2089
The robot-plagued future is here, and it needs the perfect hero. It needs you. 2089, our first-ever cinematic campaign featuring a gritty sci-fi story and five linked scenes is our biggest update yet! Become John Asimov, as you use new weapons to survive an off-world plague of killer machines and unravel the mystery behind their violent uprising, all set to a sweet synth-wave inspired soundtrack.

This update also sees a complete overhaul of the user interface, LIV integration upgrades, some improvements to enemy behaviors, as well as reactivation of the “You’re Breathtaking” achievement.

A new story-rich cinematic experience
Featuring tracks from Black Tiger Sex Machine, Draeden, Processor, and an exclusive remix from the legendary Magic Sword, the five linked scenes--played in order--make up the most we’ve dropped simultaneously, ever.

The campaign is illustrated through immersive cinematics by Comic Artist and Creator Fico Ossio, who has helped to bring life to some of our favourite heroes, including G.I.JOE, Transformers, TMNT, and Spider-Man. The campaign, inspired by some of our favourite 80’s science fiction films, also includes new enemies, weapons, models, mechanics, and more.

With this update, we hope to continually reinvent the classic action-rhythm FPS playstyle Pistol Whip is known for by continuing to expand our catalog of genres, not just musically, but cinematically, mechanically, narratively, heroically (what types of heroes you embody), and visually.

If you’re a veteran or have experience playing Pistol Whip, you can expect the difficulty of 2089 to be the toughest you’ve faced yet. Don’t worry, though; it’s nothing a trained hero like you can’t handle.

2089 will be our final update of 2020 and is our gift to all Pistol Whip owners this holiday season, coming less than a month after Pistol Whip’s first anniversary. From Immersive Reality Game of the Year at the 2019 D.I.C.E. Awards to former Myth-busting hero Adam Savage creating an awesome custom Pistol Whip controller, the last year has been truly exhilarating. We can’t wait to show you what else we have in store for the future of Pistol Whip with our next massive, game-changing update, Concierge, due Spring 2021.

Love,

Cloudhead Games

Pistol Whip "2089" Update Changelog
- Added “2089” Cinematic Action-Campaign:
- "Scene 1: Revolt” (3 difficulties)
- "Scene 2: Cage Fight" (3 difficulties)
- "Scene 3: Metal Mincer" Scene (3 difficulties)
- "Scene 4: The Nest" Scene (3 difficulties)
- "Scene 5: Die by Dawn" Scene (3 difficulties)
- 6 Cinematics: Revolt Intro, Cage Fight Intro, Metal Mincer Intro, The Nest Intro, Die by Dawn Intro, 2089 Finale
- New enemy faction: The Metal - 1 Shot Android, 2 Shot Android, 4 Shot Android
- 3 New Enemy Types: Auto Turret (1 Shot), Minigun Turret (16 Shot), Shield Trooper (melee-only)
- A MOTHER TRUCKIN’ BOSS
- 1 New Weapon Type: Smart-burst Pistol

- Completely redesigned User Interface: Added Arcade, Campaign, Challenge, Training, & Info sections
- Added 4 new weapon models: The Sci-Fi Collection
- Added 3 new sci-fi inspired weapon wraps
- Added 9 new futuristic, and 9 new tactical colour customization options
- Added 9 new space-infused metal finishes
- Added 1 new weapon SFX: Number 6 - Sci-Fi Revolver
- Implemented LIV 1.5 SDK integration
- Fixed the “You’re Breathtaking” achievement (!)
- Modifiers are no longer enabled in the tutorial
- Fixed an issue causing weapon metals to display incorrectly when launching the game
- Enemies were taught some rules of engagement and are less likely to shoot you in the back now

nodes.title: Hotfix 0.6.20.228 Now Live
nodes.body_text:
Howdy folks, we're back with a small Hotfix. This update squashes a couple of bugs that were keeping the achievements "Old Boy" and "Not Very Good at Retiring" from awarding in some instances as well as fixing the Challenge destination. Huge shout-out to everyone who provided information or reports about these problems, you rock!

Love,
Cloudhead Games

Pistol Whip "0.6.20.228" Update Changelog
*Fixed a bug preventing “Old Boy” from awarding in some cases
*Fixed a bug preventing “Not Very Good at Retiring” from awarding in some cases
*Challenge destination fix

node.reviewDescription:
I very rarely write reviews but here goes........
When i bought my Oculus quest in April 2020 i asked a few facebook groups what games to buy, most people say beat saber. Now i have beat saber but have put maybe 2 hours into it max in 8 months.........then i saw the trailer for pistol whip and looked up a few reviews, looked good so i took the plunge and WOW!
This is such an immersive experience where for the duration of each stage/level i am taken  to a different VR level.
I love the levels, guns, the customisation of the guns through different colours and bullet sounds, the music in this is spot on and works so well with this game.
As well as all this Cloudhead games (the developers) keep adding fantastic FREE dlc, the dlc thats just dropped today is a short campaign mode where you feel like your in a terminator film making your way to Skynet😍 the 4 shot gun is immense as well.
My other fav game is Lies beneath but with this new dlc and constant updates, pistol whip is still my number 1 go to VR experience that i cannot recommend enough👍 well done and thankyou everyone at Cloudhead games.

website_page_meta.description: Pistol Whip is an unstoppable action-rhythm FPS. Journey through a cinematic bullet hell powered by a breakneck soundtrack to become the ultimate action hero legend.
website_page_meta.title: Pistol Whip · Oculus Quest
